      • CampaignResource

        public CampaignResource()

    • Method Detail

      • getCampaigns

        public List<de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Campaign> getCampaigns(String sid)
        Returns all campaigns for the given user. It also returns the campaign location object and the campaign topics.
        Address: GET [server]/resources/campaign?sid=test_user
        Parameters:
        sid - valid session id
        Returns:
        list of campaigns

      • createCampaign

        public de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Campaign createCampaign(de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Campaign campaign,
                                               String sid)
        Create new campaign and returns the persisted object (with valid id). Every campaign needs a location. Therefore a location object inside the campaign is needed (id is enough). It is also possible to sends a list of initial campaign topics (id is not needed) inside the campaign object.
        Address: POST [server]/resources/campaign?sid=test_user
        Parameters:
        campaign - Campaign object
        sid - valid session id
        Returns:

      • updateCampaign

        public de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Campaign updateCampaign(de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Campaign campaign,
                                               String sid,
                                               Integer campaignId)
        Change the values of the campaign object of the database with the given one. It don't change foreign keys (relations). Only the campaign manager can change the campaign object.
        Address: PUT [server]/resources/campaign/[campId]?sid=test_user
        Parameters:
        campaign - Campaign Object
        sid - session id
        campaignId - id from the campaign
        Returns:
        the campaign object from database (changed or unchanged)

      • deleteCampaign

        public void deleteCampaign(String sid,
                  Integer campaignId)
        Deletes the campaign and some related objects if the user is the campaign manager.
        Address: DELETE [server]/resources/campaign/[campId]?sid=test_user
        Parameters:
        sid -
        campaignId -

      • getCampaignMessages

        public List<de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Message> getCampaignMessages(String sid,
                                                         Integer campaignId)
        Gives you all messages from a campaign. Only paticipants of this campaign can see this object.
        Address: GET [server]/resources/campaign/[campId]/message?sid=test_user
        Parameters:
        sid - valid session id
        campaignId - id of the campaign
        Returns:
        list of messages
